title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 463.1 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) Each local
social services department shall offer and provide promptly upon request, in
accordance with this Part, social, educational and medical family-planning
services to persons of child-bearing age, including minors who can be
considered sexually active, who are applicants for or recipients of
public-assistance, recipients of medical assistance only, or recipients of
supplemental security income. (b) Family-planning services means social, educational, and medical services to
enable individuals, in accordance with their wishes, to limit family size, space children or prevent or reduce the incidence of births out of wedlock. Not
included under this definition are abortions performed either for therapeutic
or nontherapeutic purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
463.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
